tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My daughter was suffering from Stomach infection and she was in an acute pain. Being Sunday no doctor was available. I found Dr. Aditi available immediately through online booking platform from Prato. I was happy with her treatment and recommende her for sure. Thanks Dr Aditi.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.

review: I will recommend dr anjali , very supportive  ,line of treaent and follow up  are very good .thank u dr
reply_text:

Dr Aditi Birje

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My daughter was having high grade fever alongside cough and cold. We did a video consultancy with her on Practo. From the day 1 I found her extremely caring and receptive and from all the doctors I have encountered in my life I found her the most kind and approachable. Her diagnosis and prescriptions were extremely accurate and were very helpful and comforting. 
Lastly she is a great human being …
reply_text: Thank you .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ***** ** ** ********* ************* I visited her at Shri Guru Mauli Clinic for my 3 month old baby and was very impressed with her level of care and expertise. She took the time to thoroughly examine my baby and answer all of my questions and concerns. She has a great bedside manner and made us very comfortable throughout the visit. I highly recommend Dr. Aditi to any parent in need of a pediatrician.
reply_text: Thank you.

tags: Value for money,
review: it's quite expensive. also the rate which was charged was 50% higher than the listed charge on practo app. felt like over priced
reply_text:
On the routine days we charge 1000rs for new patients and 600 rs for follow up within 6 months of first visit 
But the consultation charges on Sunday are 1500 rs.
We make it a point to inform the patients about the consulting fees before visiting.
And on that particular day you too were informed about the fees on Whatsapp before coming.

review: I was worried about my daughter skin issue and doctor Aditi has allayed my fears  and explained patiently about the issue of my baby. She responded fast and treated by baby in best possible way. She is the best doctor I came across in Practo. Thanks you doctor for for providing the best treatment to my baby
reply_text: Thank you

review: Dr Aditi is really wonderful and caring doctor.We consulted for our 9 yrs daughter and found Doctor listens patient symptoms properly and do proper diagnosys and explained things in detail with proper medicines. Also for kid - she specially asks for food habits and recommended foods for fatser recovery.and also very prompt in responding whenever do message. Really Thanks !!
reply_text: Thank you

review:
She is just wonderful and explain in details.
My sincere gratitude for her help.

I have consulted for my newborn daughter and she prescribed some good ointment for Ambikical cord and that really helped, even she helped the same way during follow up.
reply_text: Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Aditi was terrific. ************** sensitive, informative… I immediately felt at ease – and felt confident in receiving expert medical advice for my baby.She is very much responsive over Practo messages and answered all my query within 10 minutes.Fever was above 102*F and it was 3rd day when I have contacted Dr. Aditi and the prescription she  advised was really effective and baby health improved within 24 hours and he is perfectly fine after 2 days of medicines.  Highly recommended.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.

review: Doctor heard us patiently and guided us well. I was worried as my 6 year old was too dull and with acidity, cold, throat pain and mild fever. Doctor's advise to  raise her intake of fluids and leafy vegetable and then her last line, "she will be fine" made me feel a confident that the situation will not last. Luckily my daughter took some food after the interaction with doctor and all positive changes followed.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words.
